text: Hey! So, if you wanted to send someone a custom module for a late Christmas present... and you weren't a user in their portal... and they had no clue what a CLI was... how would you provide the module files to them to include it with whatever theme they are using?

There is a theme zip upload feature. You could try having them upload a theme with your module and then once installed, move it. But I have found this to be buggy. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/HubSpot-CMS-theme-zip-install-buggy-and-progress-status/idi-p/649950|https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/HubSpot-CMS-theme-zip-install-buggy-and-progress-status/idi-p/649950>
Hey thanks! Yeah, possible workaround, but hoping to find something more dummy proof. :)
